name: Heart Rate in Python
body:
### Welcome to our Little Project.
The objective of this project is to display the heart rate of a Fitbit user in a desktop application created using Python. I know, it sounds cool.

### Learning Purpose
This project is being developed purely to support the creators in the process of learning Python. So do not make fun of us... we might call your parents.

### Support or Contact
We do not give any kind of support (unless in the company that I work for... but it is not related to this anyway).
If you want to contact us, for some reason, here is my email: rabuske@outlook.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
